content: Hello! I want to implement a new architecture for Rust compiler. This architecture is supported by LLVM as an experimental backend. Where should I begin to support a new ISA, is there some guidelines I can refer to? :)
You need to add a target for it in compiler/rustc_target/src/spec.
And you'll need to add ABI lowering in compiler/rustc_target/src/abi.
It may help to look at how m68k was added.
